data.qoute: Footprints on the sands of time are not made by sitting down.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Forget all the reasons it won't work and believe the one reason that it will.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: From small beginnings, come great things.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Great oaks, from little acorns grow.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Hold on...  God knows what He is doing.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: Hold the vision... Trust the process.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute:
Human Beings grow best with encouragement and Love. 
 Today, let every word you speak (to yourself and others) be filled with kindness.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: I can and I will... Watch me!
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: I may not be there yet, but I'm closer than I was yesterday.
data.author: Unknown

data.qoute: I wondered why somebody didn't do something... then I realised that I was somebody.
data.author: Unknown
